name: photo-of-the-day-july-1-2009
title: Photo Of The Day: July 1, 2009
author: Christy Frink
excerpt: With the weather being as mild as it's been for the past few days, lots of folks have been using the time to hang out at the Nashville Zoo. Flickr user
contentEncoded:
With the weather being as mild as it’s been for the past few days, lots of folks have been using the time to hang out at the Nashville Zoo. Flickr user Scruffy Eagle caught these two zebras “sharin’ a moment” yesterday in the sun.

Photo Of The Day will be a recurring feature for Nashvillest as long you keep giving us stuff to post. Don’t worry–we’ll give you props. Just add them to the pool or tag them with “Nashvillest” if you’re feeling lazy.
